process: var matchFile = /^http:\/\/chomikuj\.pl\/(.*?\/){1,}(.*?)\,([0-9]{1,})\.mp3/gi.exec(baseURL);  var fileName = matchFile[2].replace(/\*../g, '_').replace(/\+/g, ' '); var fileID = matchFile[3]; setURL('http://chomikuj.pl/Audio.ashx?id='+fileID+'&type=2&tp=mp3', fileName+'.mp3'); finish();
